attributes.action: End Rip-Off Britain.Why should we pay so much more for everything?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The excessive UK price for the PS3 has highlighted the fact that we pay far more for the same goods than most if not all other countries.
WHY?
From ipods via petrol to cars we are ripped off every single day.
The Prime Minister should be 'bovvered' and save the people that voted him in from this ridiculous situation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
